attributes.action: Plant more trees in the countryside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the coutryside is losing its natural beauty due to logging. Trees play a huge part in helping to prevent global warming. A great way to reduce our carbon cycle would be to introduce trees to the countryside, national parks and other various areas. We cannot let the Plannet suffer anymore due to what humans have done. Please do something about it for the our future and other future generations. Thank you.

rejection.details: There are already a couple of similar petitions live that you may wish to sign: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/CO2-reduction/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/moretrees/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
